item.title: Dynamic Query Items - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
item.description: Data Items and Dynamic Query This chapter explores extracting multiple data points by defining multiple items and dynamic query. The Example 2 extracts ten data points shown below from defs/examples/fin/page/acme-snapshot.html page. MARKET CAP EPS (TTM) P/E P/C BOOK VALUE PRICE/BOOK DIV (%) DIV YIELD FACE VALUE INDUSTRY P/E The snippet of HTML from the page is <div id="snapshot"> <div> <div> <div>MARKET CAP</div> <div>382,642.57</div> <div></div> </div> <div> <div>P/E</div> <div>-</div> <div></div> </div> <div> <div>BOOK VALUE</div> <div>27.
